snippet: In spite of the millions watching the Games on any given night, history suggests that exposure during the Olympics does not necessarily drive viewers to new shows.
abstract: NBC is hoping to maintain some of the ratings lift it gained from the Summer Games in London by creating new hit shows; in spite of the millions watching the Games on any given night, history suggests that exposure during the Olympics does not necessarily drive viewers to new shows.
lead_paragraph: In spite of the millions watching the Games on any given night, history suggests that exposure during the Olympics does not necessarily drive viewers to new shows.

headline.seo: NBC Banks on Olympics to Raise Ratings for New Fall Shows
headline.main: NBC Banks on Olympics as Springboard for New Shows
headline.print_headline: NBC Banks on Olympics as Springboard for New Shows
